structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Local legislative bodies denied power of eminent domain.
law.text: Local legislative bodies shall not exercise the power of eminent domain to acquire scenic easements. Nothing contained in this chapter shall prevent the use of eminent domain to acquire all other interests or rights in real property. A scenic easement will terminate when eminent domain is used to acquire property covered by the scenic easement agreement.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 11. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 312, sec. 6.
